DOC.brief_summary: The objective of the current study is to establish the bioequivalence of linagliptin/ pioglitazone fixed dose combination tablet compared to single tablets of linagliptin and pioglitazone administered together.
DOC.brief_title: Bioequivalence of a Fixed Dose Combination Tablet Linagliptin/Pioglitazone Compared With Its Mono-components
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criteria: Healthy male and female subjects Exclusion criteria: Any relevant deviation from healthy conditions
